# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #131](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#131)

#### Yados

Could a Shardbearer materialize his or her Shardblade inside another person? What about something inanimate like stone?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO
